source.title: Brassicaceae

leads.lead_text: Hairs of lower stem mixed branched and unbranched; fruits 3–7 mm long, 2–4 mm wide, less than 3 times as long as broad, sides always rounded
Hairs of lower stem always branched; fruits 6–10 mm long, 1–2.5 mm wide, more than 2.5 times as long as broad, often with almost parallel sides
